product.name: Enchant√© Linen Shirt
product.deskripsi: Straight-cut shirt in airy linen with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke with a pleat at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
